divs: sighting detailson december 27th 1992 at around 10:00pm my family and i saw what we thought atthe time was the most amazing thing, we had just picked up a pizza intallahassee and were pulling into our home on tobacco road (near the napa storejust off of the havana quincy highway) in havana florida when we got out of thecar and noticed what appeared to be 2 two flashlights (not normal flashlightsbut the type that look like mini spotlights) across the road about 100 yardsaway coming from the top of the tree line, these lights were shining downwardtowards the ground and they appeared to be scanning the area they were notmoving very fast they just appeared to be looking for something. the first thing me and my family did was start to laugh be because we thoughtthat a couple of rednecks had set up their deer stands in the trees and did notrealize how close they were to the road and that the first sheriffs patrol thatcame by would see them.then suddenly it must have hit my whole family at one time and then i said whatmy father was thinking, how did they get their deer stands to the top of 60ftpine trees that taper off at the end, when i said this my father said lets getinside, once we got inside our home we went to the far end bedroom that facedthe road and tree line and continued to watch the lights through the largegarden window for several more minutes.then suddenly a large glowing red ball (the balls both of them appeared to beabout 5 feet in diameter) came from the left of these lights out of the forestand shot strait up to where these lights were coming from then immediately agreen\blue colored glowing ball came from the right and shot up the same as thefirst (these illuminated balls were very strange they appeared to glow likelight sticks or leds not very bright they also moved very strange they sort ofglided up to where the lights were coming from not very fast) this was followedimmediately by the two spotlights turning off everything went dark for about 2seconds.then a massive gold\white colored light shot strait down to the ground thislight was larger than the search lights they use at the airports and it lit upthe whole forest with a glowing white\gold color light the craft appeared at thetop of this light it was also glowing the same color the craft appeared to bemaybe 70ft or more in length and maybe 10 or 15 feet in height it looked like aalmost flat saucer but not like any movie or photo i have ever seen.it then disappeared in the blink of an eye (or it could have simply turned allof its lights off i dont know????) during the whole experience we heard nosounds nothing and we did not see the craft itself until it illuminated theforest. i am judging its height and length by comparing it to the pine trees inthe area. i do not want to say exactly how long we watched this but i believe itwas more than ten minutes and we were very close to it i would say around 100yards
trends: There have been no other sightings in Havana
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Lights at tree top level Florida
